title: 'Infinitely Polar Bear' Director Relives Childhood With Mentally Ill Parent
teaser: NPR's Audie Cornish talks with Maya Forbes and her daughter Imogene Wolodarsky about their new film, Infinitely Polar Bear. Forbes wrote and directed the fictionalized take on her own childhood.
